ai-tika-s0404t23:2_5: but if they do have wrong view, they should follow one:
ai-tika-s0404t23:2_6: “When you have wrong view, although you don’t have wrong view, both they are questioned about the annihilation, regardless of all these, but they should be given up again and again.”
ai-tika-s0404t23:2_7: And here, as to the words, “Possessed of freedom is fully developed, many skillful qualities are fully developed because of this,”
ai-tika-s0404t23:2_8: (but) there is the questions that is from cutting off the fetters and by the preliminary work for the destruction of the preliminary works - the noble right way (of Nibbāna).
ai-tika-s0404t23:2_9: And when the path of the fruits is developed and cultivated it’s very fruitful and beneficial. It’s shattered.
ai-tika-s0404t23:2_10: For the development of the path in connection with fruits there is no fulfilment of the fruit,
ai-tika-s0404t23:2_11: ” For one who greatly rejoices in the sense of urgency, etc.,
ai-tika-s0404t23:2_12: For this faculty of happiness is found in you that happiness associated with the perception faculty.

ai-tika-s0404t23:3_0: The confirmation for the ascetic, namely, is finished.
ai-tika-s0404t23:4_0: The commentary on the ascetic practices is finished.
